title: PassFab iOS Password Manager 1.3.2 – Recover or find iOS password with one click

title: Grungetastic 2.70.3 – Create grungy, distorted, and distressed images
content: Grungetastic creates grungy, distorted, and distressed images.   Grungetastic for the photographer who loves everything grungy. title: Tri-CATALOG 7.3.7 – Catalog your removable media
content: Tri-CATALOG analyzes and catalogues an unlimited number of volumes. If you spend too much time finding a picture or a file on your hard disk or your CDs, just let Tri-CATALOG analyze them once, and you’ll recover them in a wink. Tri-CATALOG was built to save a list of the contents of your folders, local […]

title: Deskovery 3.3 – Save time managing your windows
content: Deskovery makes it easy to find the window you want out of all your open windows, just move your mouse to see the full list of all open windows, select one and move it to front in a single click.   Stop wasting time aligning windows, with Deskovery your windows are magnetic. title: Moku Hanga 1.45 – Make a Japanese wood-block print from any photo
content: Moku Hanga (Moku is the Japanese word for “wood,” while hanga is the word for “print”) allows you to create an artistic wood-block print from any picture or snapshot — no need for time-consuming carving — the artists from JixiPix do all the work for you! title: Chalkspiration 1.10 – Create chalkboard art without the dusty clean up
content: Creating chalkboard art is crazy and fun. Call it old school but chalkboard art is making a comeback. It’s everywhere these days and the more we see it, the more we swoon. title: Artoon 1.11 – Quickly turn yourself into an artoonist
content: Artoon is an easy-to-use app that will create colorful illustrations for the basis of your design projects, or simply have fun transforming profile pictures into toon-like characters for Instagram, Facebook, Pintrest or other social networking sites. title: Dramatic Black & White 2.6.5 – Adjust and improve black and white photos
content: Dramatic Black & White gives you the look of classic black-and-whilte. And it’s deeper than nostalgia, simpler times, and less color – it’s the artistic soul of photography. title: nuTXT 3.17 – Create a new .txt file on your desktop
content: nuTXT is a tiny but useful utility app that enables you to create a new .txt file on your desktop, a feature which you are used to.
